info.title: Meetup Profiles API
info.description: The API for managing Meetup profiles.

post.description: This method allows an authenticated member to join a group by creating a profile

parameters.name: *group_id
parameters.description: Id of group to join

parameters.name: *group_urlname
parameters.description: Urlname of group to join

parameters.name: answer_{qid}
parameters.description: Answers to questions from groups API join_info question fields

parameters.name: intro
parameters.description: Provides a Member an opportunity to tell the group about themselves

parameters.name: new_photo
parameters.description: file upload for a new member photo

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: photo_id of the photo to use for this profile

parameters.name: site_name
parameters.description: Name of members site. Max length is 32

parameters.name: site_url
parameters.description: Link to members site. Max length is 80

parameters.name: exit_comment
parameters.description: Optional message to the organizer when leaving

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Request that additional fields (separated by commas) be included in the output

parameters.name: add_role
parameters.description: Allows those with permission to assign one of the following roles: coorganizer, event_organizer, assistant_organizer

parameters.name: answer_{qid}
parameters.description: Answers to questions from groups API join_info question fields

parameters.name: intro
parameters.description: Provides a Member an opportunity to tell the group about themselves

parameters.name: new_photo
parameters.description: file upload for a new member photo

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: photo_id of the photo to use for this profile. set to 0 to unset the current photo

parameters.name: remove_role
parameters.description: Allows those with permission to remove one of the following roles: coorganizer, event_organizer, assistant_organizer

parameters.name: site_name
parameters.description: Name of members site. Max length is 32

parameters.name: site_url
parameters.description: Link to members site. Max length is 80

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: An organizer-defined member title.

get.description: This method returns member *profiles* associated with a particular group. Meetup members have separate profiles for each group they join.

parameters.name: *group_id
parameters.description: Return profiles in the group with this ID

parameters.name: *group_urlname
parameters.description: Return profiles for the group with the given custom URL path

parameters.name: *member_id
parameters.description: Return the profiles for members with these IDs, separated by commas

parameters.name: *topic, groupnum
parameters.description: Group identification by topic, deprecated

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: comma delimited list of optional response properties. A value of membership_dues will populate membership dues for the authorized user or members of the groups the authorized user organizes

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: if leads, only profiles for members of the leadership team are included

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status filter for members. Only organizers may see pending. Request must also contain a `group_id` or `group_urlname`. Status may be one of active, pending

delete.description: Declines one or more requests for group membership

parameters.name: anon
parameters.description: Optional Boolean value indicating whether the declining members email address should be hidden in the resulting response. Default is true.

parameters.name: ban
parameters.description: Optional Boolean value indicating whether or not to ban the member in the future. Default is false

parameters.name: explanation
parameters.description: Optional explanation to send to the members being declined. Max message size is 2000

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: Comma-delimited numeric pending member IDs. The maximum allowed is 200

parameters.name: send_copy
parameters.description: Optional Boolean value indicating whether or not to send a copy to the member issuing the decline. Default is false

post.description: Approves one or more requests for group membership

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: Comma-delimited numeric pending member IDs. The maximum allowed is 200

parameters.name: send_copy
parameters.description: Optional Boolean value indicating whether or not the org should receive a copy of the message sent to the approved members

parameters.name: welcome_message
parameters.description: Optional message to send to the members being approved. If not provided, the groups default welcome message will be sent. Max message size is 2000

get.description: Gets Group Profiles.nFor Member Profiles, see [this endpoint](/meetup_api/docs/members/:member_id)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-delimited string of optional response field names.nThis may include birthday, gender, groups, privacy, self and topics

patch.description: Edits Group Profiles.nTo fetch Group Member Profiles,nsee [this endpoint](/meetup_api/docs/:urlname/members/:member_id#get)

parameters.name: add_role
parameters.description: Allows those with permission to assign one of the following roles:nassistant_organizer, coorganizer, event_organizer

parameters.name: answer_{qid}
parameters.description: Answers to questions from groups API join_info question fields.nnThe name of these parameters must contain a suffix of _ + the numericnquestion id from the Meetup Groups join info question listnnAnswers may not be longer than 1000ncharacters in length

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-delimited string of optional response field names.nThis may include birthday, gender, groups, privacy, self and topics

parameters.name: intro
parameters.description: Provides a Member an opportunity to tell the group about themselves,nin at most 255 characters

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Numeric id of the photo to use for this profile. Send a value of 0 to unset the current photo

parameters.name: remove_role
parameters.description: Allows those with permission to remove one of the following roles:nassistant_organizer, coorganizer, event_organizer

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: An organizer-defined title,nin at most 255 characters

get.description: Gets Member Profiles.nFor Group Profiles, see [this endpoint](/meetup_api/docs/:urlname/members/:member_id)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-delimited string of optional response field names.nThis may include groups, privacy, and topics

parameters.name: add_topics
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of topic ids to add to members interest list

parameters.name: bio
parameters.description: Member bio of up to 250 characters

parameters.name: bio_privacy
parameters.description: Preference for hiding or showing member bio to others.nValue may be one of hidden, visible

parameters.name: birthday
parameters.description: Members date or year of birth.nMay be specfied in one of the following formats.nyyyy, mmddyyy or alternatively -1, which indicates that birthdayndata should be cleared

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: Valid Meetup City identifier that indicates the city in which which member resides

parameters.name: facebook_privacy
parameters.description: Preference for hiding showing information members facebook connection.nValue may be one of hidden, visible

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Members gender.nValue may be one of female, male, none, other

parameters.name: groups_privacy
parameters.description: Preference for hiding or showing group memberships to others.nValue may be one of hidden, visible

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Members language preference.nValue may be one of de, en_US, es, fr, it, ja, pt

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: A valid latitude to resolve the closest city to associate with the member

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: A valid longitude to resolve the closest city to associate with the member

parameters.name: messaging_pref
parameters.description: Preference for which members may contact you via the Meetup platform.nValue may be one of all_members, groups_only, orgs_only

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Member name

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: A valid Photo id to this member has previously updated to use as profile photo

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: A radius (in miles) to search for the closest city given a center pointnidentified by (lat, lon) to associate with the member.nDefaults to 25.0 when not provided

parameters.name: remove_topics
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of topic ids to remove from members interest list

parameters.name: sync_photo
parameters.description: When set to true, this parameter will sync all the groupnprofile photos for the member with the provided photo_id

parameters.name: topics_privacy
parameters.description: Preference for hiding or showing member interests to others.nValue may be one of hidden, visible
